ExportedFolder.Name: ZZ - Raid Buffs - Image & Text aura

Trigger.Name: Walking Dead
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[\w]+:(?<walkingdeadname>[a-zA-Z']{1,15}) [a-zA-Z']{1,15} gains the effect of Walking Dead

Trigger.Name: Walking Dead Loss
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1E:[\w]{8}:(?<walkingdeadlossname>[a-zA-Z-' ]{3,21}) loses the effect of Walking Dead

Trigger.Name: Divine Veil
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1(A|E):[A-Z0-9]{8}:(?<target>[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31}) (?<effect>(gains|loses)) the effect of Divine Veil from (?<caster>[a-zA-Z-']{1,15} [a-zA-Z-']{1,15})

Trigger.Name: Regen Tracker
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[A-Z0-9]{8}:(?<name>[\w-' ]{1,31}) gains the effect of Regen from (?<caster>[\w-' ]{1,31}) for (?<time>..)(\...)? Seconds

Trigger.Name: ZZ - Cancel Image Aura (to add each aura to disable)
AA - README - Raid Buffs Setup (Read Description)
Trigger.Description:
https://github.com/Aho-Senpai/TEMP-SETUP-GUIDE/blob/master/README.md
HOW TO SET THIS UP ?
1 - Make a folder in your Local Triggers, name it whatever you want.
2 - Copy&Paste the "AA Aura Config" trigger in that new folder
3 - Select said folder as a Startup Folder under : Options -> Edit Configuration -> General -> Startup Folder
4 - Edit the Actions in the"AA Aura Config" Trigger to place the starting image where you want, the rest will stay alligned
5 - YOU ARE DONE !!
Optional - Download and select Trick Attack sound file from DeadCatFish soundpack here : https://onedrive.live.com/?cid=8485af4f28fc460f&id=8485AF4F28FC460F%21248&authkey=%21ANLpmdeIRpsF%5FTk
